page.title: 10Eridge Fox Hunt
page.content: The Fox Hunting season is from the beginng of November to the end of February.They keep away from farms in the lambing season and stick to the woods and downs when the weather is wet so as not to damage the ground. There are 28 hounds in the Eridge pack which are kept at Ringmer.About 40 riders attend a hunt on a week day and up to 80 at weekends.They kill the foxes because they are getting too many and they kill the lambs and chickens.The anti-blood sports group protest about twice a year,but it does not cause too much trouble.
